Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Expands eligibility under the veterans tuition awards program to include recipients of the award of the Purple Heart
Summary: Expands eligibility under the veterans tuition awards program to include recipients of the award of the Purple Heart.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expanding eligibility under the veterans tuition awards program to include recipients of the award of the Purple Heart
